thread.title: BRIEF-Corcept Therapeutics, Dohmen Entered Into Settlement Agreement And Mutual Release Of Any And All Claims That May Have Existed Between Parties

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Corcept Therapeutics, Dohmen Entered Into Settlement Agreement And Mutual Release Of Any And All Claims That May Have Existed Between Parties
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Corcept Therapeutics Inc:
* CORCEPT THERAPEUTICS - CO, DOHMEN ENTERED INTO SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT AND MUTUAL RELEASE OF ANY AND ALL CLAIMS THAT MAY HAVE EXISTED BETWEEN PARTIES
* CORCEPT THERAPEUTICS SAYS DOHMEN AGREED TO DELIVER TO CORCEPT ALL OF CASH DOHMEN COLLECTED FROM SALE OF KORLYM ON CORCEPT‘S BEHALF - SEC FILING
* CORCEPT THERAPEUTICS INC - ‍TOTAL AMOUNT DELIVERED BY DOHMEN TO CORCEPT UNDER SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WAS $12.9 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2Dexu66 ) Further company coverage:
